original_text: Seven priests will walk in front of the Covenant Box. They will carry trumpets as they walk. On the seventh day, you and your soldiers must march round the city seven times. At the same time, the priests will blow into their trumpets.
korean_text: 제사장 일곱은 일곱 양각 나팔을 잡고 언약궤 앞에서 나아갈 것이요 일곱째 날에는 그 성을 일곱 번 돌며 그 제사장들은 나팔을 불 것이며

sentences.original_text: Seven priests will walk in front of the Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 제사장들이 언약궤 앞에서 걸어갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will carry trumpets as they walk
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 걸을 때 나팔을 들고 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: you and your soldiers must march round the city seven times
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 네 군사들은 성을 일곱 번 돌아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: the priests will blow into their trumpets
